question: Which are the tennis players that won the gold medals in mixed doubles at the 2016 Summer Olympics?
explanation: Bethanie Mattek-Sands and Jack Sock are the tennis players that won the gold medals in mixed doubles at the 2016 Summer Olympics. The tennis tournament at the 2016 Summer Olympics was held at the Olympic Tennis Centre, in Brazil, from 6 to 14 August. The competition was played on a fast hard court surface used in numerous North American tournaments that aims to minimize disruption for players.
